languages.text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Lowers all stats by 10. The creature makes a TOU Save after receiving any damage. Failed TOU Save results in receiving {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Prone{/g} for 1 round.
All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round.
All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round.

All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

languages.text: Todas las características se reducen en −10. Cuando el personaje sufre daño, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia o quedar {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}derribado{/g} durante 1 asalto. Recibir cualquier curación elimina este efecto.
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Todas las características se reducen en −10. Cuando el personaje sufre daño, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia o quedar {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}derribado{/g} durante 1 asalto. Recibir cualquier curación elimina este efecto.

languages.text: すべての特性が−10減少する。キャラクターがダメージを受けるたび、抵抗判定に成功しなければ、1ターンの間、{g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。回復力を受け取ると、この効果は無効となる。
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: すべての特性が−10減少する。キャラクターがダメージを受けるたび、抵抗判定に成功しなければ、1ターンの間、{g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。回復力を受け取ると、この効果は無効となる。

languages.text: 所有属性降低10点。每当此角色遭受任何伤害时，都需要进行坚韧抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。受到任何治疗效果时，移除此效果。
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: 所有属性降低10点。每当此角色遭受任何伤害时，都需要进行坚韧抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。受到任何治疗效果时，移除此效果。

languages.text: Alle Eigenschaften werden um −10 reduziert. Erleidet der Charakter Schaden, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}niedergestreckt{/g} zu werden. Heilung jeder Art entfernt diesen Effekt.
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Alle Eigenschaften werden um -10 reduziert. Erleidet der Charakter Schaden, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}niedergestreckt{/g} zu werden. Heilung jeder Art entfernt diesen Effekt.

languages.text: Toutes les caractéristiques sont réduites de 10. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts, le personnage doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Tout soin reçu dissipe cet effet.
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les caractéristiques sont réduites de 10. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts, le personnage doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Tout soin reçu dissipe cet effet.

Toutes les caractéristiques sont réduites de 10. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts, le personnage doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round. Tout soin reçu dissipe cet effet.

languages.text: Все характеристики уменьшены на 10. При получении урона персонаж должен пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление или оказаться опрокинутым на 1 раунд. Лечение снимает эффект.
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.

traits.locale_text: Все характеристики уменьшены на 10. При получении урона персонаж должен пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление или оказаться {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}опрокинутым{/g} на 1 раунд.
Все характеристики уменьшены на 10. При получении урона персонаж должен пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление или оказаться {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}опрокинутым{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text: Tüm nitelikler 10'ar puan azalır. Karakter, hasara maruz kaldığında Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}yere devrilir{/g}. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Her türlü iyileşme, bu etkiyi ortadan kaldırır.
languages.original_text: All characteristics are reduced by −10. Whenever the character suffers any damage, they must pass a Toughness resistance test or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} for 1 round. Any healing received removes this effect.
